Name: TakoSho
Notes: An octopus enemy that can be defeated using most of the player's attacks. It can also be defeated by an enemy's explosion attack and Koopa Shells. It moves a set distance. Once the player gets close, it will shoot two rocks at the player, one at a time, to damage them. It drops a Coin when stomped or Ground Pounded and it drops Star Bits when damaged through other means. It can be frozen and defeated by the Orange Luma.

Obj_arg2.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg2.Description: The rate at which it moves. Default is 5.

Obj_arg3.Name: Movement Distance
Obj_arg3.Description: How far it moves from its initial position. Default is 500.

Obj_arg5.Name: Connect to Collision?
Obj_arg5.Description: If set, it will connect to the collision mesh below.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

ScoreAttack.Description: This object scores 100 points in The Chimp's challenges.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted and eaten by Yoshi.
